service.name: eduroam
service.tagline: Seamless Wi-Fi access for research and education around the world​.
service.description: e​​duroam​ (education roaming) is the secure, world-wide roaming access service developed for the international research and education community. eduroam allows students, researchers and staff​ to seamlessly access internet connectivity when within range of a hotspot, whether they're moving across campus or visiting other participating institutions​.
service.userValue: With benefits for users and for their campus IT departments, eduroam saves time and facilitates active and enduring collaboration between countries and institutions. eduroam supports research and education by providing: roaming broadband in more than 80 territories worldwide; access at thousands of locations, with one ​password; secure and privacy-preserving technology; reciprocal service that is free-of-charge to users.
service.providers: GÉANT and Global eduroam governance committee
